message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - This paper deals with natural language processing and text classification, which falls under the scope of cs.CL.
2. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) - The paper involves the task of detecting spoilers in online comments, which can be seen as a form of information retrieval.
3. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The proposed method involves the use of machine learning techniques such as attention mechanisms and neural networks.
4. cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) - The paper deals with analyzing comments on video websites, which can be seen as a form of social network analysis.
5. cs.MM (Multimedia) - The paper deals with analyzing comments on videos, which falls under the scope of multimedia analysis.
